Content:: Asanka Shehan Semasinghe is a Sri Lankan Politician and a member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka from Anuradhapura. He belongs to the Sri Lanka Podujana Peramuna.[1][2] Following the mass resignation of the Sri Lankan cabinet in the wake of the 2022 Sri Lankan protests, he was appointed as the Minister of Trade by President Gotabaya Rajapaksa on 18 April 2022.[3][4]  This article about a politician from North Central Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
Title: Asanka Shehan Semasinghe - Wikipedia
